/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the scene below. The street, lined with lush green trees and bushes, stretches out into the distance, flanked by buildings on either side. The sky above is a clear blue, adding a serene backdrop to the urban landscape. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the greenery providing a stark contrast to the blue sky and the gray buildings.
